contextId.occurrenceNote: Here the word “sound” means to be firm and unwavering. The abstract nouns “faith,” “love,” and “perseverance” can be stated as verbs. Alternate translation: “and they must firmly believe the true teachings about God, truly love others, and continually serve God even when things are difficult” (See: [Abstract Nouns](rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-abstractnouns))
contextId.quoteString: ὑγιαίνοντας τῇ πίστει, τῇ ἀγάπῃ, τῇ ὑπομονῇ
contextId.glQuote: sound in faith, in love, and in perseverance
